column4: istarnes - okay, the root of my question is actually something very silly... I've recently upgraded to Intrepid, and for some reason, GIMP has disappeared completely off my graphics menu (even when you edit it, it isn't just unchecked, it's not there at all). So I was basically just wondering if it would cause any issues if I added it manually to the menu (the programme is installed - I just executed it with no problems from the command l
adding items to your menus wont cause issues
the executable name stays the same with each version
